import React from "react" import { ListGroup } from "reactstrap" import CartItem from "./CartItem" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import "../../../styles/shoppingCarts.css" import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux" import { cartUiActions } from "../../../store/shopping-Cart/cartUiSlice" const Carts = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const cartProducts =useSelector(state=>state.cart.cartItems) const toggleCart = ()=>{ dispatch(cartUiActions.toggle()) } return (
{car}
Subtotal amount : $123
) } export default Carts
